sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 45.011 Definitions.—In all statutes about practice and procedure:

sections.heading: Applicability
sections.text: 45.021 Applicability.—Chapters 45-51, 55-57, 68 and 69 apply to all actions, whether heretofore at law or in chancery, unless specifically provided otherwise in such chapters or parts thereof.

sections.heading: Disbursement of surplus funds after judicial sale.
sections.text: of surplus funds after judicial sale.

sections.heading: Sale or assignment of rights to surplus funds in a property subject to foreclosure.
sections.text: or assignment of rights to surplus funds in a property subject to foreclosure.

sections.heading: Execution of supersedeas bond when required of the state or its political subdivisions.
sections.text: of supersedeas bond when required of the state or its political subdivisions.

sections.heading: Definitions. In all statutes about practice and procedure:(1)“Bond with surety” means a bond with two good and sufficient sureties, each with unencumbered property not subject to any exemption afforded by law equal in value to the penal sum of the bond or a bond with a licensed surety company as surety or a cash
sections.text: In all statutes about practice and procedure:(1)“Bond with surety” means a bond with two good and sufficient sureties, each with unencumbered property not subject to any exemption afforded by law equal in value to the penal sum of the bond or a bond with a licensed surety company as surety or a cash deposit conditioned as for a bond.(2)“Defendant” means any party against whom relief as referenced in subsection (3) is sought.(3)“Plaintiff” means any party seeking affirmative relief whether plaintiff, counterclaimant, cross-claimant; or third-party plaintiff, counterclaimant or cross-claimant.History.—s. 1, ch. 67-254; s. 16, ch. 2023-8.

sections.heading: Applicability. Chapters 45-51, 55-57, 68 and 69 apply to all actions, whether heretofore at law or in chancery, unless specifically provided otherwise in such chapters or parts thereof
